chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Butcher's Yard
chapters.info: Rana, p. 87 (100)—One of Min's aunts. She convinced Min to say that she had just heard a couple talking when one of her first viewings got her in big trouble; she had seen that a man and a woman were going to get married, but he was already married. When he ran off with her, his wife came to find her and threatened to hurt her.
